snippet: The latest survey by The New York Times and CBS News shows that more than two-thirds of Americans want the Supreme Court to overturn some or all of the legislation.
abstract: The latest survey by The New York Times and CBS News shows that more than two-thirds of Americans want the Supreme Court to overturn some or all of the legislation.

byline.original: By ADAM LIPTAK and ALLISON KOPICKI

headline.main: New Poll: The Supreme Court and the Health Care Law

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
